Package server

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Client
    Created by Baljit Sarai on 15.02.16.
    ClientHandler
    This class primarily accepts incoming connections and deals with them appropriately.
    CommandHandler
    This class Validates and Executes the server commands.
    Config
    This class is going to set all configurations of the program.
    ServiceQueue
    A Thread Worker pool.
    ServiceTask
    This is Runnable type class that does the task of reading available data from a stream.
    SocketTerminate
    Tries to fix the socket.
    Terminal
    This class runs in a loop and gets input from the user in the console to execute commands on the server.
    TrafficController
    This is the main controller of the program.
    TrafficServer
    The TrafficServer is the main server.Tt contains and handle the main server logic.
    ValidateConnection
    This class will contain the task of validating the handshake of the newly incoming connection.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DataControl
    Created by Baljit Singh Sarai on 01.03.16.
